DOC.brief_summary: Aim was to investigate efficacy of current treatments - water, chewing gum, and olive oil, in resolving postoperative ileus.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating the Efficacy of Current Treatments for Reducing Postoperative Ileus
DOC.criteria: Patients underwent abdominal surgery for non neoplastic diseases Metastatic disease History of inflammatory bowel disease Postoperative fever Gastrointestinal fistula Mint or olive allergy; and/or Earlier abdominal radiation
